# Digital Critical Edition of *Soledades*

This project is a scholarly TEI-encoded critical edition of Luis de Góngora’s *Soledades*, developed during my doctoral research. It involved:

- Manual collation of 20 witnesses
- TEI/XML encoding of a critical text
- Annotation, normalization, and variant handling
- Digital publication using Edition Visualization Technology (EVT)
